name: items
description: The items to display in the breadcrumb. Please refer to the component source for the `BreadcrumbItem` type definition.

name: contextMenuPadding
description: The padding size of the context menu dropdown.

name: id
description: The element ID of the breadcrumb.

name: maxWidth
description: The maximum width of the breadcrumb. If the breadcrumb exceeds this width, items will be truncated. Set to `-1` to disable truncation.

name: showContextActions
description: Determines if the context actions are shown for the last breadcrumb item.

name: truncationOffset
description: The number of items to show before truncating the breadcrumb.
